title: Wayfinder Live (2016)
brief_description: In 2016 Swinburne University developed a location-based game designed for councils to increase social connection. Users were rewarded with unlockable augmented/mixed reality artworks throughout Melbourne.

constellations_other.name: Location and exploration
constellations_other.description: A comparative look at location-based gaming and street art and how the way we experience these two art forms has moved out of traditional spaces and onto the street.

description: In 2016 Swinburne University developed a location-based game designed for councils to increase social connection. Users were rewarded with unlockable augmented/mixed reality artworks throughout Melbourne.
